mdRecord.dcterms:description: When Larz Anderson died in 1937 with no children, his widow oversaw the gift of Anderson House and its contents to the Society of the Cincinnati, of which Larz had been a devoted member. -- https://www.societyofthecincinnati.org/anderson_house/history [work]
